description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time we take a look at the sudden banning of Linux gamers on Apex Legends, a community of gamers I'm a part in. Video game companies will gladly support this community when it comes to making money but as soon as one snag comes their way it's a quick situation of cutting a whole group of paying customers out of nowhere. Why? Let's find out! Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
title: The Video Game Industry Hates Linux Gamers...
